biotools.summary:
Protein Docking Model Evaluation by 3D Deep Convolutional Neural Networks.
A Deep-learning based dOcking decoy eValuation mEthod.
Dove evaluates computational protein-protein docking models by 8 deep learning networks and provides the probability that the decoy is correct.
